## ILike class

Filters is a key component when communicating with a backend. The ILike filter resembles the case-insensitive ilike operator in SQL.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class ILike implements Filter 
```
**Implements:** [Filter](./forms42core.filter.md)
